name: Shoot Target Sniper
description:
Completely enemy killing and gun shooting physics based for fans of hot pro real shooting with stunning graphics and thrilling environments. Shoot Target Sniper is here for your great enjoyment time with Lots of astounding and action levels. In this kill enemy fast duty shoot simulation you can face fifteen difficult challenging levels and game provide multiple exciting deadly combat sniper latest rifles. Use suitable gun according to this situation. Show that, you are a best sniper and show sniper elite furious shooter skills to shoot down the enemies and solve the problem of your city.

Features:
* Awesome and stunning graphics
* FREE to play!
* Unique maps and stunning locations
* Easy and intuitive controls
* FREE game to play.
* Compatible with all devices.
